note.p: Mauritius-born French naturalist and ornithologist. Administrator of the museum of Metz, 1844–63. Author of Monographie des picidées (1859–62).
Société d’histoire naturelle de Moselle, http://shnm.free.fr/collectionsH.N.METZ.html (accessed 21 March 2022)
Virtual International Authority File: https://viaf.org/viaf/5711359/ (accessed 21 March 2022)
